statements: SELECT * FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Sale'
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM market_events WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM market_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM market_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM market_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Sale'
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM market_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM market_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM market_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING event_count > 1
SELECT event_description FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Promotion' ORDER BY event_id ASC
SELECT * FROM market_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM market_events WHERE impact_level > 2;
SELECT event_name AS 'Event', event_type AS 'Type' FROM market_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_data WHERE news_source = 'CNN';
SELECT news_title, news_date, news_content FROM news_data ORDER BY news_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM market_events WHERE impact_level > 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM market_events WHERE event_type = 'Earnings Call' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM market_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT news_title, news_source, news_date FROM news_data WHERE news_source LIKE '%Finance%' ORDER BY news_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_data WHERE news_content LIKE '%stock market%' AND news_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM market_events;
SELECT event_title, event_date FROM market_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_title, event_description FROM market_events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM news_data WHERE news_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT event_title, news_title, risk_level FROM market_events JOIN risk_exposure ON market_events.event_id = risk_exposure.event_id JOIN news_data ON risk_exposure.news_id = news_data.news_id;
SELECT * FROM market_events LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_title, event_date FROM market_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT news_id, news_title, news_date FROM news_data ORDER BY news_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_title, event_description FROM market_events WHERE event_title LIKE '%important%';

SELECT e.event_id, e.event_date, e.event_title, n.news_title FROM market_events e LEFT JOIN risk_exposure r ON e.event_id = r.event_id JOIN news_data n ON r.news_id = n.news_id WHERE r.risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MarketEvents;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM MarketEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM NewsData WHERE news_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM NewsData WHERE news_id = 10;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(*) AS exposure_count FROM ExposureData GROUP BY event_id HAVING exposure_count > 1;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM MarketEvents WHERE impact_on_risk = 'High';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM NewsData ORDER BY news_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT event_event, exposure_id, risk_exposure FROM ExposureData ORDER BY event_id, exposure_id DESC;

SELECT MarketEvents.event_date, NewsData.news_title, RiskAssessment.risk_score FROM MarketEvents JOIN NewsData ON MarketEvents.event_id = RiskAssessment.event_id WHERE RiskAssessment.risk_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM market_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM market_events WHERE impact_level > 2;
SELECT news_title, content FROM news_data ORDER BY news_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score < 5;
SELECT assessment_id, exposure_level FROM exposure_data WHERE exposure_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM market_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name
SELECT event_name, impact_level FROM market_events WHERE impact_level > 2
SELECT news_title, content FROM news_data WHERE news_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM market_events JOIN risk_assessment ON market_events.event_id = risk_assessment.event_id WHERE risk_score > 5
SELECT * FROM exposure_data JOIN risk_assessment ON exposure_data.assessment_id = risk_assessment.assessment_id WHERE exposure_level < 3 ORDER BY risk_score ASC
